Package com.uw.cs506.team03.smartstock.controller

Class InventoryController

java.lang.Object
com.uw.cs506.team03.smartstock.controller.InventoryController
@RestController public class InventoryController extends Object
This class is the controller for the inventory table

      @GetMapping("/filterInventories") public List<AllInOneDTO> findProductsByDynamicCriteria(@RequestParam(name="store",required=false) Integer store, @RequestParam(name="category",required=false) String category, @RequestParam(name="category",required=false) String supplier)
      This method is used to add a product to a store in the inventory
      Parameters:
      store - the store id
      category - the category name
      supplier - the supplier name
      Returns:
      the list of products

      targetQuantity - the target quantity
      Returns:
      a string indicating the success of the operation

    • deleteProductToAStoreFromInventory

      Parameters:
      inventoryId - the id of the inventory
      storeId - the id of the store
      productId - the id of the product
      Returns:
      a string indicating the success of the operation
